evidence.claim: FirstLight Home Care prioritizes HIPAA compliance in its operational framework.
The company adheres to HL7 standards for health information exchange.
FirstLight has dedicated resources for developer documentation concerning security and compliance.
Integration with various healthcare standards is a focus area, including FHIR for electronic health records.
The company utilizes cloud services to enhance its healthcare delivery platforms.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of using X12 transactions or API automation.
